fields.name: Replacement Weapon:
fields.value: Skyward Harp, The Viridescent Hunt, Hamayumi, Prototype Cresent (R5)

fields.name: Best Artifact Set:
fields.value:
*Wanderer's Troupe <:4x:957694032216215573>*
• Elemental Mastery +80
• Charged Attack DMG +35% if the character uses a Catalyst or a Bow

fields.name: Second Best Artifact Set:
fields.value:
*Shimenawa's Reminiscence <:4x:957694032216215573> (Reverse Melt)*
• ATK +18%.
• When casting an Elemental Skill, if the character has 15 or more Energy, they lose 15 Energy and Normal/Charge/Plunging Attack DMG is increased by 50% for 10s. This effect will not trigger again during that duration.

fields.name: Third Best Artifact Set:
fields.value:
*Blizzard Strayer <:4x:957694032216215573> (Freeze)*
• Cryo DMG Bonus +15%
• When a character attacks an enemy affected by Cryo, their CRIT Rate is increased by 20%. If the enemy is Frozen, CRIT Rate is increased by an additional 20%.
